description:
An exhibition of paintings by Minoo Mafi is underway at E1 Gallery. 
The exhibit named “The House That Turns Away” will run until December 26 at the gallery located at 1 Hamid Dead End, off Lesani Alley, Jebheh St., off Mahdieh St. in the Elahieh neighborhood.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN – Da Theater Hall in Tehran is hosting the one-act parody “Nina in the Morning” written by Christopher Durang.
title: Da Theater Hall hosting Christopher Durang’s “Nina in the Morning”

description: TEHRAN – The Persian translation of the book “Nationalizing Iran: Culture, Power, and the State, 1870-1940” written by Afshin Marashi has been released in the bookstores across the country.
title: “Nationalizing Iran” available in bookstores

description: TEHRAN- The 30th edition of Iran’s International Theater Festival for Children and Young Adults, a prestigious event in the world of children's theater, came to a close on Thursday with a grand closing ceremony held in the city of Hamedan.
title: Hamedan children's theater festival announces winners

description: TEHRAN - Shargh analyzed the letter sent by Lebanon’s Foreign Minister, Youssef Rajji, to Abbas Araghchi. According to the paper, Rajji formally informed Araghchi that, at the present juncture, he could not accept Tehran’s invitation for an official visit.
title: Beirut’s cautious letter to Tehran

description: TEHRAN – A public back-and-forth between Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi and his Lebanese counterpart, Youssef Rajji, may now be entering a lull. The de-escalation follows Araghchi's announcement on X that he had accepted Rajji’s invitation to visit Beirut to sort out their differences—a move prompted by Rajji’s apparent unwillingness to travel to Tehran.
title: Lebanon's FM sees public bickering with Iran cool

description: TEHRAN – Iran has roundly condemned the seizure of an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela by U.S. forces.
title: ‘This is piracy’: Iran condemns US seizure of oil tanker off Venezuelan coast

description: TEHRAN – Russian President Vladimir Putin and Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian have underscored a shared commitment to accelerating the implementation of the comprehensive strategic cooperation agreement signed between the two countries.
title: Putin calls strategic pact with Iran a ‘turning point’ as implementation advances

description: TEHRAN – Iran has roundly condemned the intensification of restrictions, by the United States, against the Iranian Diplomatic Mission to the United Nations (UN) in New York, saying the U.S. government’s abuse of its host-country status disrupts the efficiency and credibility of the world body.
title: Tehran condemns US tightening of restrictions on Iran’s UN Diplomatic Mission

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian departed Tehran on Wednesday, December 10, 2025, for a two-day regional tour, beginning with an official visit to Kazakhstan and followed by a trip to Turkmenistan.
title: Iran strengthens ties in Central Asia as Pezeshkian visits Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Aytaollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei met with a large number of elegists and eulogists in Tehran on Thursday to mark the birth anniversary of Lady Fatimah Zahra (pbuh), the beloved daughter of the prophet (pbuh).
title: Leader: Enemy seeks Iranian mind shift as only path towards success

description: TEHRAN – On the sidelines of the Conference on “People’s Rights and Legitimate Freedoms in the Thoughts of Ayatollah Khamenei,” the Tehran Times spoke with Professor Jin Liangxiang, a senior research fellow at the Shanghai Institute for International Studies, to explore the shifting dynamics of global governance, human-rights discourse, and power politics in West Asia.
title: U.S. actions, not Iran’s behavior, triggered nuclear standoff: Chinese analyst

description: TEHRAN – The skeletal remains of Gaza’s neighborhoods have become a site of renewed tragedy as Storm Byron batters the enclave, claiming over a dozen lives since Wednesday.
title: Storm Byron kills newborns and buries families as Gaza’s bombed ruins collapse

description: TEHRAN – The European Broadcasting Union’s (EBU) decision to allow Israel into the  2026 Eurovision contest has triggered a wave of condemnation. The Swiss winner of 2024 announced they would return their trophy, arguing that Eurovision’s stated values of “unity, inclusion and dignity for all” are fundamentally at odds with Israel’s ongoing war on Gaza.
title: Eurovision exposes ethical erosion

description: TEHRAN - The IOC Executive Board (EB) has decided to nominate Soraya Aghaei Haji Agha, a badminton player from Iran who competed at the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games and a member of the IOC Athletes’ Commission (AC), as a candidate for IOC membership.
title: Soraya Aghaei proposed for election as IOC member

description: TEHRAN – The confrontation between the United States and Venezuela in late 2025 is not a sudden flare-up but the continuation of Washington’s long-standing pressure campaign.
title: Piracy and pressure: US push against Venezuela

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Para taekwondo athletes won three gold and one silver medals at the Dubai 2025 Asian Youth Para Games on Friday.
title: Para taekwondo athletes snatch three golds at 2025 AYPG

description: BEIRUT—In early December, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu once again peeled back the last veneer of diplomatic pretence.
title: Israel’s aggressive blueprint: A rebuttal to Lebanon’s pro-Israel propaganda

description: TEHRAN – Growing international pressure and unexpectedly strong Palestinian compliance are reshaping calculations around advancing the Gaza truce.
title: Gaza truce at a crossroads

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s boys’ team defeated Chinese Taipei 3-1 (15-25, 25-18, 25-22, 25-17) at the 2025 ISF U15 World School Volleyball Championship final on Friday.
title: Iran win 2025 ISF U15 World School Volleyball Championship

description: TEHRAN--Cultural tourism is effective in increasing mutual understanding, bringing nations closer together, and developing sustainable cooperation, and this area is an effective tool of public diplomacy, said Iranian Ambassador to Turkey Mohammad-Hassan Habibollahzadeh.
title: Cultural tourism is effective tool of public diplomacy, Iranian ambassador to Turkey says

description: TEHRAN--Measures taken in various areas of Tehran in recent years have brought the capital city one step closer to transforming from a ‘city of work’ to a ‘city of life and tourism’ destination.
title: Tehran on path to becoming city of life and tourism

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s minister of cultural heritage, tourism and handicrafts on Friday urged ancient nations to develop joint mechanisms to protect cultural heritage, warning that armed conflicts and neglect of historical identity pose the greatest threats.
title: Iran proposes academic cooperation council at Ancient Civilizations Forum in Athens

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Minister of Cultural Heritage, Tourism and Handicrafts Seyyed Reza Salehi-Amiri and Greek Tourism Minister Olga Kefalogianni met in Athens on Thursday to discuss plans for expanding cooperation in tourism, museums and cultural heritage.
title: Iran, Greece discuss joint action plan to expand tourism, heritage cooperation

description: The admiral in charge of U.S. military forces in Latin America will retire two years early on Friday, amid rising tensions with Venezuela that include Wednesday's seizure of an oil tanker and more than 20 deadly strikes on suspected drug-smuggling boats, Reuters reported.
title: Top admiral forced out as U.S. escalates military aggression in the Caribbean

description: TEHRAN – In a landmark episode of The Tucker Carlson Show released Thursday, prominent media personality and political commentator Tucker Carlson issued his most blistering condemnation to date of the ongoing atrocities in Gaza.
title: Tucker Carlson condemns ‘abominable’ human cost in Gaza after visiting maimed children

description: TEHRAN- The value of commodities and services export from Iran’s free zones increased by 19 percent during the first eight months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-November 21), as compared to the same period of time in the previous year.
title: Export of commodities, services from free zones increases 19%

description: In another ceasefire violation, the Israeli military carried out heavy attacks on southern and eastern Lebanon on Friday, claiming in a statement that it struck Hezbollah military infrastructure and a “training camp,” The Cradle reported.
title: Israel launches heavy strikes across southern and eastern Lebanon in new ceasefire violation

description: TEHRAN- The Turkish Statistical Institute announced that the value of this country’s imports from Iran in the first ten months of 2025 increased by four percent compared to the same period last year, reaching $2.035 billion.
title: Iran’s export to Turkey up 4% in 10 months on year

description: TEHRAN – Iran has raised daily gas extraction from the South Pars gas field, it shares with Qatar in the Persian Gulf, to 722 million cubic meters, up six million cubic meters from last winter, after a year of targeted drilling and overhaul work, Pars Oil and Gas Company (POGC), which is in charge of developing the field, announced.
title: South Pars gas output rises 6m cubic meters

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s road transit of goods reached 10.97 million tons in the first eight months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-November 21), driven by stronger activity in international freight corridors, the country’s road transport authority said.
title: Transit of goods through Iran’s land borders nears 11m tons in 8 months

description: On the Sidelines of the Conference on “People’s Rights and Legitimate Freedoms in the Thoughts of Ayatollah Khamenei”
title: Chinese Scholar Jin Liangxiang Talks to Tehran Times

description: TEHRAN – An Iran-Kazakhstan business conference convened in the Kazakh capital Astana on Thursday, with the presidents of both countries, senior ministers, private sector officials, and business delegations from the two countries in attendance, seeking to deepen commercial ties.
title: Tehran, Astana plan to boost trade, deepen transport, private-sector ties

description: At least 11 Palestinians have died in storm-hit Gaza from cold and collapsing buildings within the last 24 hours, Middle East Eye reported Friday.
title: Freezing temperatures and floods kill infants and children in storm-battered Gaza

description: TEHRAN –Iran’s UN envoy to Geneva, Ali Bahreini, has called for the international community’s investment in infrastructure, employment, education, and other services to improve conditions in Afghanistan for the sustainable return of refugees to their home countries.
title: Global investment essential for sustainable return of refugees: Iran’s UN envoy

description: TEHRAN – Iran moved down one place to 10th in the FIFA Futsal Women’s World Ranking released on Friday.
title: Iran move down in FIFA Futsal Women’s World Ranking

description: TEHRAN – Attending the seventh session of the United Nations Environment Assembly (UNEA-7), the head of the Department of Environment (DOE), Shina Ansari, is promoting environmental diplomacy by holding talks with participating countries.
title: DOE fostering environmental diplomacy at UNEA-7

description: TEHRAN - There is a quiet language in nature that humans rarely notice. Long before a wildfire becomes visible, the forest whispers warnings through rising temperatures, unusual animal movements, and subtle shifts in humidity. For centuries, these signals remained unheard, and by the time flames were seen from a distance, it was often too late. Today, a new kind of listener has entered the world’s forests. Not human, not animal, but artificial intelligence trained to hear what we cannot, and to protect ecosystems that are struggling to survive in a rapidly warming world.
title: When forests talk: Using AI to listen to nature and protect burning ecosystems

description: TEHRAN - Zahra Pouladi Jarfi, who won the first gold for Iran delegation in the 2025 Asian Youth Para Games, is optimistic about the future.
title: Para powerlifter Pouladi optimistic about future

description: TEHRAN – Para powerlifter Mahdiyeh Ehsani dedicated her gold medal to the Iranian people.
title: Para powerlifter Ehsani dedicates her gold to Iranian people

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s boys’ and girls’ wheelchair basketball teams won a gold and silver medal at the Dubai 2025 Asian Youth Para Games on Thursday.
title: Wheelchair basketball 3x3 teams win gold and silver at 2025 AYPG

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s boys’ and girls’ wheelchair basketball teams won a gold and silver medal at the Dubai 2025 Asian Youth Para Games on Thursday.
title: Wheelchair basketball teams win gold and silver at 2025 AYPG

description: TEHRAN — Ayeneh-Kari, the art of mirror-work in Persian architecture, was inscribed on UNESCO’s Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity on Thursday following a decision by the Intergovernmental Committee meeting in New Delhi.
title: Persian art of Ayeneh-Kari added to UNESCO intangible heritage list
